alert.note: Alert for Okaloosa; Santa Rosa (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 18 at 10:50PM EDT until April 20 at 5:20AM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama...Florida... Blackwater River Near Baker affecting Covington, Okaloosa, Santa Rosa and Escambia Counties. For the Blackwater River...including Baker...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Blackwater River Near Baker. * WHEN...Until early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Minor flooding of secondary roads and lowlands from the Highway 4 Bridge downstream. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CDT Monday the stage was 11.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.4 feet Tuesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/mob. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
